formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'MEETME_INFO' =-
[Syntax] MEETME_INFO(<keyword>,<confno>)
[Synopsis] Query a given conference of various properties.
[Description] Returns information from a given keyword. (For booleans 1-true, 0-false) Options: lock - boolean of whether the corresponding conference is locked parties - number of parties in a given conference activity - duration of conference in seconds dynamic - boolean of whether the corresponding coference is dynamic

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
